name: cp77-external-radio
description: Triggers external media player (such as Spotify or VLC) when entering and exiting cars
homepage: This will link to nexus mods once uploaded
author: J Bright

scripts.make-zips: echo Compressing Release && tar -cavf RadioStatus.zip init.lua GameUI.lua output.json relay.exe readme.md && echo compressing source && tar -cavf SourceCode.zip init.lua GameUI.lua output.json readme.md relay.js package.json package-lock.json
